title: Braised Red Cabbage Recipe (with Apple, Bacon & Balsamic Vinegar)
summary: Braised Red Cabbage Recipe (with Apple, Bacon & Balsamic Vinegar) is a gluten free and primal side dish. For $2.1 per serving, this recipe covers 10% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 3 servings with 574 calories, 12g of protein, and 51g of fat each. This recipe is liked by 573 foodies and cooks. Head to the store and pick up sea salt and pepper, fennel seeds bashed, cabbage outer leaves and core removed into irregular chunks, and a few other things to make it today. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 1 hour and 10 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 43%. This score is good. Try Pork Chops with Braised Bacon and Apple Cabbage – inspired by Beyond Bacon: Paleo s that Respect the Whole Hog, Braised Cabbage – with Apple, Hazelnut and Smokey Bacon, and Red cabbage with balsamic vinegar & cranberries for similar recipes.
